turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Hi. I would like to order a pizza order some pizzas from the new pizzeria Bella Luna, por favor, thank you, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to need four pizzas. I would like to know a little bit more about the specialty types of pizzas that they have. I really like Hawaiian pizzas or chicken barbecue types of pizzas. I'd love a a Works pizza if you if there is a Works pizza available.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, they have both hawaiin and chicken bbq and a supreme which might be similar to the "works".

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fantastic.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me think. I would like to order one chicken barbecue pizza. Do they have anything any type of pizza that has bacon on it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, there is a meat lovers pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Meat lovers pizza, okay that's fantastic. All right, can I have one small meat lovers pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: one of the Supreme pizzas small, one of the Hawaiian pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What is the most popular pizza that the Bella Luna has? Most popular.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there most popular is the supreme.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and all smalls?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. So, and then I would like to also order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: one of the hawaiian, one of the chicken barbecue, one of the meat lovers and one of the supreme all small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, so 4 small pizzas, 1 chix bbq, 1 meat lovers, 1 supreme, and 1 hawaiin.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That'd be fantastic. Can you please let me know what the total will be, please? I want extra cheese on all four, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Extra cheese on all four.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, there is an additional charge for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total for 4 small pizzas is $60, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick-up, delivery, or dine-in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll pick that up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, I really No, that would be That's all. Thank you so much for your help today. That was wonderful.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
